title: I need help :(
body: So whenever i try to redeem a card it kept saying  "We apologize, but our store was unable to process your payment at this time. Please wait a few minutes and try again". what does this mean? I really need help! ~

replies.body: Could be an issue with the method of payment, but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look.  Our billing team will be able to assist directly, so we'll see you there!
I did the little support ticket thingy, when will i get a answer back or info back?{{sticker:cass-cry}}
